name: sniper-rifle-improved
title: Carbine and improved Sniper Rifle
author: AivanF
description:
Rifles for long-range killing. Based on mod by Porkchop13, I added:
- Rebalance to make it strong enough for modded monsters but not recklessly cheap or expensive
- Shooting sound, new graphics
- 2 guns: early Carbine, and later advanced Sniper Rifle.
- 3 tiers of ammo: basic, piercing and uranium magazines.
